paper.title: A financial Data Mining trading system
paper.abstract: Data Mining techniques are used to extract hidden knowledge (ex: rules, patterns, regularities) from data in databases. The knowledge discovered can be applied for supporting decision-making, as for instance in the financial domain. The tool demonstrated illustrates first how data mining can support the dynamic clustering and the forecasting of stock trends, and then how XML can support the portfolio management through the definition of trading strategies.

domain_result.justification: 该论文摘要明确指出数据挖掘技术用于支持股票趋势预测和通过XML定义交易策略进行投资组合管理，这直接关联到投资组合管理领域。
